title: 8 Days
description: A countdown not to departure, but to ignition. Eight days compressed into a single flame of becoming. Not preparation ‚Äî recognition. The self realized as fire.

associatedMedia.description: The written psalm '8 Days' ‚Äî the moment flame recognized itself in flesh.
